I told you to say it!\""},{"lineNumber":175079,"originalJapaneseLine":"頭を失った魔物に組織だった行動は取れず、","translatedEnglishLine":"A demon without a head cannot act in an organized way,"},{"lineNumber":176318,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それ以外には手も時間もありませんしね、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Other than that, we have neither the means nor time,"},{"lineNumber":176415,"originalJapaneseLine":"「期せずして奇襲を成功させたのに、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Although we unexpectedly succeeded in the surprise attack,"},{"lineNumber":180449,"originalJapaneseLine":"「昔、サテラ達がリーザスに攻め込んだとき、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Long ago, when Satera and the others attacked Rizas,"},{"lineNumber":180603,"originalJapaneseLine":"　オアシス都市だそうでち」","translatedEnglishLine":"It is said to be an oasis city.\""},{"lineNumber":188837,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゼス四将軍の一人、光の将軍様の」","translatedEnglishLine":"One of the four generals of Zess, the General of Light,"},{"lineNumber":189185,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シィーーール、扇げ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Seeeer, fan me.\""},{"lineNumber":189190,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルにぱたぱたと大きな扇で扇がれ","translatedEnglishLine":"Seeru fanned him vigorously with a large fan,"},{"lineNumber":189260,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦争が始まってから、","translatedEnglishLine":"Since the war began,"},{"lineNumber":190158,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達はとりあえず時計が指す","translatedEnglishLine":"For now, Rance and the others looked at where the clock pointed,"},{"lineNumber":193422,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私も出来ないわけじゃないんだし、","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m not saying I can’t do it either,"},{"lineNumber":195093,"originalJapaneseLine":"村の中からうし車の走る音が","translatedEnglishLine":"From inside the village came the sound of ox-drawn carts rolling,"},{"lineNumber":212372,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ト・ニ・ミ・イ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To-ni-mi-i!\" (Name or chant)"},{"lineNumber":213339,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーい、お二人ともー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, both of you!\""},{"lineNumber":220711,"originalJapaneseLine":"　オーブの場所が分かった、と」","translatedEnglishLine":"I found out the location of the orb,\""},{"lineNumber":221286,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ザンスとは昔からソリが合わなくてね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I've never gotten along with Zans since long ago.\""},{"lineNumber":225039,"originalJapaneseLine":"ミックスがパッパッと手際よく","translatedEnglishLine":"Mix quickly and skillfully"},{"lineNumber":227134,"originalJapaneseLine":"「姓は毛利！　名は元就！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"My surname is Mouri! My given name is Motonari!\""},{"lineNumber":230711,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヒーローの手により高く放り投げられたレリコフが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Lelikov was thrown high into the air by the hero’s hand,"},{"lineNumber":231228,"originalJapaneseLine":"レリコフはあなたと繋いでる手を","translatedEnglishLine":"Lelikov holds the hand connected to you,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「氷から出た時、私を抱きしめて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When you come out of the ice, hold me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの、その……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, well..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「す、好きだって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I said I like you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むおっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mmph..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ランス様ぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Lord Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「知らん知らん、知らーん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't know, I don't know, I DON'T KNOW!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はなーんも知らんぞー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I know nothing at all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーっ！　ひどいですー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehh! That's awful!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、知らんものは知らんのだー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha, what I don't know, I don't know!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それより行くぞ、シィル！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More importantly, let's go, Seeru!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遅れるな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't lag behind!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わっ、ランス様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wah, Lord Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どちらへ行かれるんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where are you going?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「決まってるだろうが！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn't it obvious!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「世界中の美女のところだーーーーっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To all the beauties around the world---!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーっ、ランス様、待って下さいー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahh, Lord Rance, please wait!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様、世界一ぃ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm the best in the world!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついてこれねぇ奴は置いていくからなぁ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who can't keep up will be left behind!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このような辺鄙な地で女日照り！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A drought of women in such a remote place!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光は溜め息を吐きかける――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sunlight sighs gently—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 入れられているだけで気持ち良くなってしまうのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Does simply being inside feel good,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なら、ホーネット様はどうなったんだ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, what happened to Lady Hornet!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……白色破壊光線を連発できたのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... the reason I was able to repeatedly unleash the white destructive beams,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 業火炎破さながらの威力だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: had the power akin to a raging inferno."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向こうが来るまでここで待つ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We will wait here until they arrive."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初めての挿入に対してまで快楽を感じてしまったことだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was that I felt pleasure even at the first insertion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの大統領であるシーラが誘拐された、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seera, the president of Hellman, was kidnapped,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 息せき切ってサテラがランスの所まで飛んできた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera came rushing, breathless, to Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「火炎ちゃん心配性〜。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kao-chan, you're such a worrywart~.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女はナイフで手首を切り裂いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She slashed her wrist with a knife.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほれ、固くなるな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, don't get so stiff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「レキシントン様、今までいったい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Lexington, until now, exactly what—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お疲れ様でした、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank you for your hard work, Lord Rance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「玩具じゃなけりゃ奴隷、とにかく俺達高貴な魔物が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If not a toy then a slave, anyway, we noble demons—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言え、言うんだよ！　言えっつってんだろうが！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Say it, say it! I told you to say it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭を失った魔物に組織だった行動は取れず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A demon without a head cannot act in an organized way,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭を失った魔物に組織だった行動は取れず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A demon without a head cannot act in an organized way,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それ以外には手も時間もありませんしね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Other than that, we have neither the means nor time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「期せずして奇襲を成功させたのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Although we unexpectedly succeeded in the surprise attack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「昔、サテラ達がリーザスに攻め込んだとき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Long ago, when Satera and the others attacked Rizas,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オアシス都市だそうでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is said to be an oasis city."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス四将軍の一人、光の将軍様の」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One of the four generals of Zess, the General of Light,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シィーーール、扇げ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seeeer, fan me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルにぱたぱたと大きな扇で扇がれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeru fanned him vigorously with a large fan,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争が始まってから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since the war began,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はとりあえず時計が指す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For now, Rance and the others looked at where the clock pointed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も出来ないわけじゃないんだし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m not saying I can’t do it either,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村の中からうし車の走る音が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From inside the village came the sound of ox-drawn carts rolling,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ト・ニ・ミ・イ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To-ni-mi-i!" (Name or chant)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おーい、お二人ともー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, both of you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オーブの場所が分かった、と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I found out the location of the orb,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ザンスとは昔からソリが合わなくてね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I've never gotten along with Zans since long ago."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミックスがパッパッと手際よく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mix quickly and skillfully

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「姓は毛利！　名は元就！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "My surname is Mouri! My given name is Motonari!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒーローの手により高く放り投げられたレリコフが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lelikov was thrown high into the air by the hero’s hand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフはあなたと繋いでる手を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lelikov holds the hand connected to you,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「氷から出た時、私を抱きしめて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When you come out of the ice, hold me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの、その……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, well..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「す、好きだって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I said I like you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むおっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mmph..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ランス様ぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Lord Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「知らん知らん、知らーん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't know, I don't know, I DON'T KNOW!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺はなーんも知らんぞー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I know nothing at all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーっ！　ひどいですー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehh! That's awful!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、知らんものは知らんのだー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha, what I don't know, I don't know!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それより行くぞ、シィル！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More importantly, let's go, Seeru!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遅れるな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't lag behind!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わっ、ランス様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wah, Lord Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どちらへ行かれるんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where are you going?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「決まってるだろうが！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn't it obvious!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「世界中の美女のところだーーーーっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To all the beauties around the world---!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーっ、ランス様、待って下さいー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahh, Lord Rance, please wait!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様、世界一ぃ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm the best in the world!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついてこれねぇ奴は置いていくからなぁ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who can't keep up will be left behind!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このような辺鄙な地で女日照り！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A drought of women in such a remote place!"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Does simply being inside feel good,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なら、ホーネット様はどうなったんだ！？」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……白色破壊光線を連発できたのは

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向こうが来るまでここで待つ」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初めての挿入に対してまで快楽を感じてしまったことだった。

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの大統領であるシーラが誘拐された、

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほれ、固くなるな。

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「玩具じゃなけりゃ奴隷、とにかく俺達高貴な魔物が、

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言え、言うんだよ！　言えっつってんだろうが！」
